ComicInfo.Series: Moon Maid: Catacombs of the Moon
ComicInfo.Summary:
Regular SolicitThe fate of Nah-ee-lah hangs in the balance as she struggles to survive the horrors of the hidden subterranean world of the Moon! Take a trip through the vivid worlds of Edgar Rice Burroughs and discover the fierce fighting spirit of one of the truly iconic heroines of the 20th century. The Moon Maid: Catacombs of the Moon #3 comes with two covers - Main by Larry Watts and a 350-copy limited-edition Virgin Art cover also by Watts.
Limited Edition SolicitReturn to the Moon with this rare 350 copy limited edition Virgin Art cover of The Moon Maid Catacombs of the Moon #3! Put it under glass with your favorite grading company!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Main Cover | Larry Watts | 1 | LE | Limited Edition Virgin Art Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Larry Watts | 2 |
